        public static List<ScanLevelProjection.ScanProjectionParser> parsers(ScanLevelProjection.ScanProjectionParser... parsers)
        Type-safe way to define a list of parsers.
        Parameters:
        parsers - as a varArgs list convenient for testing
        Returns:
        parsers as a Java List for input to the scan projection framework

      • expandMetadata

        public static TupleMetadata expandMetadata(TupleMetadata base,
                                           FileMetadataManager metadataProj,
                                           int dirCount)
        Mimic legacy wildcard expansion of metadata columns. Is not a full emulation because this version only works if the wildcard was at the end of the list (or alone.)
        Parameters:
        scanProj - scan projection definition (provides the partition column names)
        base - the table part of the expansion
        dirCount - number of partition directories
        Returns:
        schema with the metadata columns appended to the table columns
